pages.text: The Lunar Realm contains unique structures:$(br2)$(l)Lunar Temple$()$(br)Found in Lunar Forest and Lake biomes. Contains chests with valuable loot including armor and magical items.$(br2)$(l)Eclipse Sanctum$()$(br)Found in Eclipse Wastes. Contains the Eclipse Altar for summoning the Eclipse Monarch boss.

pages.title: Stellar Spire
pages.text: $(l)Stellar Spire$()$(br)Tall towers found in Starfall Hills. At the top is a Stellar Spire Core used to summon the Star Devourer boss.$(br2)Explore carefully - hostile mobs spawn throughout the Lunar Realm, and the bosses are formidable foes!
